comment: I was supposed to get a B in the class, the last week of class I made her angry so she gave me a C and moved to Texas.

This woman is ridiculous.  She will correct your paper so you can get a "better" grade, but then will give you a C on it.  Don't listen to the other reviews, you can't miss class more than twice, you feel like your in prison, and she doesn't know anything about historic events. Avoid if possible, she will drive you CRAZY! She also thinks she's a go

Dr. Hebb. Notice the doctor before her name so she has a very strange/different personality but its GREAT! absolutely need the book...and she gives you 3 revisions to make corrections so there is no reason anyone shouldnt pass & even get an A. also try to stay on top of the online assignments they add up at the end of the semester. GOOD LUCK!

Great professor!!she is very easy. as long as you do all of the blog entries and do the essays then you should get an A. she lets you turn in each essey 3 times so you have a chance to revise to get an A. a few hw assignments but they are easy. =)

Great Professor! We had about 4 or 5 essays, and she gave us multiple opportunities to fix the essays to get an A. In-class discussions were fun. There are a lot of journals and on-line discussions, just get them done and your grade will be fine. Highly Recommended!

She's very unclear about what needs to be done regarding the essay content.  I did all my essays and completed the portfolio on time and she failed me.  I thought the whole semester I was going to get an A but I failed.  Just make sure you communicate well with her because she is very unclear about certain things.

You will love Dr. Hebb. She is really fun and always jokes around with the class. She really challenges you to think about current issues. She does A LOT of things due online every week but just keep up with them and you'll be fine. 4 essays which you get 3 chances to revise and 1 in-class essay for the final. I definitely recommend her class!

Great teacher!! She's fun in a sarcastic kind of way. She gives a lot of little assigments which is sometimes hard to keep up with if you don't pay attention. She posts everything online and she repeats it in class. Gives 3 chances to revise papers and she's always available during office hours for help Attendance is pretty mandatory.
Great teacher be prepared to be involved in great class discussions and learning. If your not willing to work for an A then I would advise not taking this professor.
Great teacher if you like to larn alot. Involvement is a must be this class will make you an better writer and you should be prepared to work. Work hard and you will get an A!

only 4 essays all year with no tests and assigned reading is only expected to be skimmed unless it's a couple pages. essays are corrected 3 times before finally graded so it's pretty much impossible to fail.

Great professor. Pretty easy class to make an A in if you do the reading and do the assignments properly. Quizzes and tests are rare. There is a fair amount of writing, but she offers you several chances to revise your essays. The discussions are interesting and interactive. Definitely recommended.

Dr. Hebb is awesome. She was the first English teacher I had at KSU and she is amazing. READ EVERYTHING, GO TO CLASS, DO THE HOMEWORK. If you do those things you will get an A. She does give alot of writing work but she helps you with anything you need help with. As long as you stay on task and do the work, its awesome.
